remarks: A conditional containing a signum is true if it is true in all three possible cases.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Oct-2018.)
statement:
sgn3da.0 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
sgn3da.1 $e |- ( ( sgn ` A ) = 0 -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
sgn3da.2 $e |- ( ( sgn ` A ) = 1 -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
sgn3da.3 $e |- ( ( sgn ` A ) = -u 1 -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
sgn3da.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ A = 0 ) -> ch ) $.
sgn3da.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ 0 < A ) -> th ) $.
sgn3da.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ A < 0 ) -> ta ) $.
sgn3da $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
